titles.title: European Union Religious Freedom Act
To amend the International Religious Freedom Act of 1998 to include several additions to the many forms of violations of the right to religious freedom.

bill.summary: 5/9/2014--Introduced. European Union Religious Freedom Act - Amends the International Religious Freedom Act of 1998 to include among Congress's finding with respect to the forms of government-sponsored or government-tolerated violations of religious freedom prohibitions against: (1) homeschooling, (2) religious methods of meat production, (3) circumcision, and (4) wearing religious garb.
